summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Office of Housing; changing the planned use of land purchased with Urban Renewal program income; approving the sale of Parcels 33 and 34 in the I-90 Redevelopment Project area to Andrew Branch; authorizing the Housing Director to execute and administer a Contract for Sale of Land and Deed; designating the disposition of sales proceeds; and ratifying and confirming prior actions.
committee: Housing, Human Services, Education and Civil Rights
